Model.BugReport

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Mail.Subject
      • Model.BugReport.Comment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<Comment>

    public class Comment
extends Subject
implements Observer<Comment>
    Class representing a comment object. Provides methods to create a new comment, and add it to another comment. Also provides methods to get comments of the comment object itself.
